emblcmci.linker
Class TrackReLinker

java.lang.Object
  emblcmci.linker.LinkAnalyzer
      emblcmci.linker.TrackReLinker

public class TrackReLinker
extends LinkAnalyzer

Re-evaluat tracks to check if it will be possible to merge some tracks as a single track. If possible, then merge some tracks and return an updated set of tracks. ConcreteElement in the Modified Visitor pattern.

Author:
miura
